casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

98-862. State v. Lewis.

Hamilton App. No. C-970289. Discretionary appeal allowed on Propositions of Law Nos. I and III only; sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 97-1985, State v. Cook, Allen App. No. 1-97-21; briefing schedule stayed.

Douglas, J., dissents.
